poem:
Title: The Ballad of Modern Love

In the search for cinematic love she waits,  
Lines reeled in silver-screen dates.  
Adrift on the filmy sea of should and might,  
Against the tides of love at first sight.  
Through the fade of passion's sunset glow,  
To a brighter dawn of love she'll go.  
Wait not for scripted romance, but true-love's dance.
